character.name: Crystal Plague Infected NPCs
character.description: Marina's crystalline patches follow the geometric patterns of dock rope braiding - parallel lines that intersect at precise angles along her forearms and shoulders. The crystals shimmer with faint blue-green hues that match the harbor water she worked around for fifteen years.
